importantDates.descriptionOfWhyDateIsRelevant: The date of the article's publication indicates when the announcement of the new Netflix series was made, signaling a current development in entertainment news related to the Kennedy family.

importantTimeframes.descriptionOfWhyTimeFrameIsRelevant: The series spans from the 1930s to 1956, covering key formative years of the Kennedy family, especially the rise of Joe Kennedy Sr. and the early life of John F. Kennedy.

keyTakeAways: Netflix is launching a new drama series titled 'Kennedy' based on Fredrik Logevall’s book 'JFK: Coming of Age in the American Century, 1917–1956'.
The series stars Michael Fassbinder as Joe Kennedy, Sr., and explores the triumphs and tragedies of the Kennedy family.
The show begins in the 1930s, tracing the ascent of Joe and Rose Kennedy and their nine children, including Jack Kennedy, who struggles with the shadow of his older brother.
The showrunner, Sam Shaw, describes the Kennedy story as American mythology with deep insights into the human struggles behind the myth and its relevance to modern society.
The series is not related to Ryan Murphy’s upcoming 'American Love Story' about JFK Jr. and will consist of eight episodes.
It is set to be released on Netflix but currently lacks a specific release date.

namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: His death in 1999 reinforces the Kennedy family’s tragic history and contributes to the narrative of 'the Kennedy curse'.

summaryOfNewsArticle: Netflix is announcing a new drama series titled 'Kennedy,' based on Fredrik Logevall’s biography, which explores the rise and struggles of the Kennedy family from the 1930s to 1956. The series stars Michael Fassbender as Joe Kennedy, Sr., and delves into the personal and political dynamics of the family, including the challenges faced by Jack Kennedy. The narrative draws on real historical events and the family’s legacy, framing the Kennedys as a reflection of American mythology and cultural evolution. The show distinguishes itself from other Kennedy-related content, such as Ryan Murphy’s upcoming series about JFK Jr., and will consist of eight episodes with no release date yet set.
title: Netflix Announces New Kennedy Family Series Starring Michael Fassbender
